Name: My Own Pet
About the game: 'My Own Pet' is a game in which you will find an animal that will need you care for him and help to grow. - Feed him - Wash him - Play with him - Treat when ill You will also take care of the environment, cleaning the dirt, pick up fruit on the ground, ...
